MetricDescription: Average of all security incident discovery time (Date of Occurrence - Date of Discovery)
Target:
x % lower than previous reporting period OR 
 x % reduction over a defined period

MetricDescription: Average of the time elapsed between various incidents during the reporting period
Target:
x % lower than previous reporting period OR 
 x % reduction over a defined period

MetricDescription: Average of the recovery time for various incidents during the period
Target:
x % lower than previous reporting period OR 
 x % reduction over a defined period

MetricDescription: Sum of all the cost incurred by the organization to resolve incidents
Target: X or lower (determined by risk assessments) As per CIS "expected loss budget determined by risk assessments processes"
Comment:
Cost is inclusive of labor cost ( hourly rate X time spent on the incident) 
 
 Could be further broken down into - type of incidents, technologies, services, locations, etc

MetricDescription: Average cost from incidents during the period
Target: X or lower (determined by risk assessments) As per CIS "expected loss budget determined by risk assessments processes"
Comment:
Cost is inclusive of labor cost ( hourly rate X time spent on the incident) 
 
 Could be further broken down into - type of incidents, technologies, services, locations, etc

MetricDescription: Average cost to recover, incurred per incident during the period
Target:
X or lower (determined by risk assessments) As per CIS "expected loss budget determined by risk assessments processes"
 
 Lower is better
Comment:
Cost is inclusive of labor cost ( hourly rate X time spent on the incident) 
 
 Could be further broken down into - type of incidents, technologies, services, locations, etc

MetricDescription: Number of incidents during the ReportPeriod
Comment: A higher value is generally considered not great but it needs to be investigated by the organization

MetricTitle: Mean Time from Discovery to Containment
MetricDescription: Average of the time elapsed between containment and discovery of security incidents
Target:
X or lower, 
 X % lower than previous period, 
 X % reduction over a defined period 
 
 Lower over time is better

MetricDescription: Financial loss due to top 3 security incidents
Comment: No target but it can be used to identify remediation plans to prevent such an incident in future
